833880.name: The Unbreakable Gumball Demo
833880.description:
The demo for The Unbreakable Gumball is designed to show off the concept and basic gameplay in a mini version of the game's city. It will be continually updated as the game is developed, so try it out and let us know what you think!

This demo is considered pre-alpha, and does not reflect the quality of the final product in any way!

What's in the demo?
  • A smaller version of Elysia
  • Targets to shoot
  • Rings to pass through
  • Dummies to punch
  • Original music

What's NOT in the demo?
  • AI-controlled enemies
  • Finished graphics
  • A full-sized map
  • Story missions

A VR headset is required to play the current version, but traditional screen and controller support is coming!
